long_description: MSR(R) Dromedary(TM) 10-liter hydration bag, with its abrasion-resistant Cordura(R) nylon shell, is built to handle your outdoor needs! Plus, boil it or freeze it, the polyurethane, food-grade coating inside handles every use. Versatile three-in-one cap lets you fill, drink and pour with ease. A clever addition for 2006, a new handle around the opening makes filling the bag easier than ever. Webbing straps down each side let you attach the bag to your pack or hang it from a limb.
short_description: MSR(R) Dromedary(TM) 10-liter hydration bag, with its abrasion-resistant Cordura(R) nylon shell, is built to handle your outdoor needs!
